pullRequest.body:
This PR adds a definition and some API for pointwise SMul between summable families.  This generalizes the action of a single Hahn series on a summable family.

- [ ] depends on: #16649  [sundry API]
- [ ] depends on: #16871  [single summable family]
- [ ] depends on: #16872 [Equiv of families]

---


[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)
